EmailTemplate.subject: Gogo Policy Change -- Invoice Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER UPDATES AND NOTIFICATIONS Dear Valued Customer,
Starting on December 1, 2020, Gogo will be invoicing your aircraft for monthly Iridium Voice and Short Burst Data services. During this transition, there will be no interruption in your service. Gogo will be reaching out to you directly to sign an updated service agreement and confirm your monthly service plan selection. We are here to help you every step of the way through this transition. The final bill from Honeywell Forge will be delivered near December 15.
HOW DOES THIS IMPACT MY EXPERIENCE?
- The Iridium phone number to the aircraft will not change. - Gogo will begin billing directly for Iridium Voice and Short Burst Data services. Starting December 1, 2020 please contact Gogo Customer Operations for any invoicing questions or to get access to the Gogo DASH portal to view usage records. Gogo Customer Operations can be reached at 303-301-3278 (option 1) or by emailing bacustomerservice@gogoair.com <[[mailto:bacustomerservice@gogoair.com]]>.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)
Will my cost for service be the same with both Honeywell Forge and Gogo? You receive an email from Gogo Customer Operations with a link to complete an online Subscriber Service Agreement. Gogo will invoice you based on your plan selection.
When will I receive the link to complete my updated service agreement? Links will be sent by October 30 from Gogo Customer Operations.
What is the deadline for completing my updated service agreement? Subscriber Service Agreements must be completed by November 13, 2020.
When does this change occur? December 1, 2020.
Do I get to keep my current phone number? Yes.
Who do I contact if I need support completing my service agreement? Gogo Customer Operations can be reached at 303-301-3278 (option 1) or by emailing bacustomerservice@gogoair.com <[[mailto:bacustomerservice@gogoair.com]]>.
Will I notice any disruption to my service with Honeywell Forge or Gogo? Service will remain active through this transition.
How will my experience change? Starting with the December billing cycle (12/1-12/31/2020), Gogo will be invoicing you for your Iridium Voice and Short Burst Data services. If you have non-Gogo services, those services will continue to be invoiced by Honeywell Forge.
Have any other questions? Contact our dedicated support team or call: 1-888-634-3330 Ext 7 or email sales.honeywellforge@honeywell.com <[[mailto:sales.honeywellforge@honeywell.com]]>. Our #1 priority is to maintain a best-in-class customer experience for you.
Sincerely, Honeywell Forge
